title: Anam - Songs for Hearts & Minds
overview: Following the huge success of last year's inaugural series, Anam – Songs for Hearts & Minds returns to RTÉ this September with a host of extraordinary Irish and international music talent gracing intimate and historical stages around the country. Produced in partnership by Other Voices and the Office of Public Works, this brand new four-part series brings together a dynamic and diverse group of artists. Across four weeks, Anam – Songs for Hearts & Minds takes viewers on a sonic journey, blending inspiring live performances with the beauty of some of Ireland's most prestigious National Monuments and Heritage Properties.
